## Form.goField() method

Navigates to the specified field in the specified block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
goField(block: string, field: string, clazz?: string): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | string | The block containing the field. |
|  field | string | The field to navigate to. |
|  clazz | string | _(Optional)_ The CSS class (optional). |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A promise indicating whether the navigation was successful.
